title: Emerging Business Models in Tech
author: Ken Martin
body: The tech industry is continuously evolving, and new business models are emerging to keep up with the changes. This article explores some of the latest trends in tech business models, including subscription-based services, platform-based businesses, and the rise of tech incubators. These models are not only changing how companies operate but also how they interact with customers and other businesses. By embracing these new business models, tech companies can stay ahead of the curve and continue to thrive in a competitive market. One of the significant events to watch this June is the Global Business Summit in New York City, where industry leaders will discuss the impact of AI on business operations and the rise of sustainable business practices.
